values: An outlaw is a criminal who hides from the police.
The police passed out posters of the outlaw to all the people.
n.歹徒，亡命之徒,逃犯,被剥夺法律保护者，丧失公权者,烈马vt.宣布…为不合法,将…放逐,剥夺…的法律保护
